review: I pre bought this when it was first available for Prime subscribers fo $19 and have used it for about 6 months.I own or have owned a Roku, Roku 2, Sony Google TV. LG Smart TV and the Firestick. I would rate the firestick above the Smart TV, Google TV and older Roku. In comparing the Roku 2 and Firestick, I find they pretty much the same in ease of use. Roku has better offerings but Firestick is faster and portable. I can easily take it on vacation and plug it into the hotel TV (if it has HDMI) and route through the hotel WIFI. The only downside for me is I can't get google play movies.Bottom line is the Firestick is a good choice for internet TV. Small, Fast and portable with decent channel offerings certainly worth the money if you have a DUMB TV.
